data_table.description: Subject ID, survey type, visit ID, visit sequence, breastfeeding, baby seen by a doctor, nurse, or other health care worker, feeding problems, baby put in an icu, baby jaundice, baby without problems, baby suffer from respiratory problems, baby medical care when was sick, bacterial vaginosis, bacterial vaginosis, exposure to dangerous chemicals, chicken pox, diabetes, ear/sinus infection, fever, fifth disease since last visit, emergency room, listeriosis, toxoplasmosis, uti, vaginitis, vaginal discharge, vaginal itching, vaginal odor, yeast infections, alcohol consumption, medications, and smoking of participants involved in the "Multi-Omic Microbiome Study-Pregnancy Initiative (MOMS-PI)" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified subject ID

variable.name: visit_ID
variable.description: Unique visit ID

variable.name: visit_num
variable.description: Visit sequence

variable.name: survey_ID
variable.description: Survey type

variable.name: alcohol_frequency_week
variable.description: Number of alcoholic drinks in an average week since last study visit

variable.name: alcohol_no
variable.description: Do not drink?

variable.name: alcohol_stopped_while_pregNAt
variable.description: Stopped drinking while pregnant?

variable.name: alcohol_yes
variable.description: Alcoholic drinks?

variable.name: antibiotics_since_last_visit
variable.description: Any antibiotics since last visit?

variable.name: baby_breastfed
variable.description: Breastfeeding?

variable.name: baby_breastfeeding_time
variable.description: Breastfeeding? How long?

variable.name: baby_care_first_week
variable.description: Was the baby seen by a doctor, nurse, or other health care worker during the first week after he or she left the hospital?

variable.name: baby_checkup
variable.description: Well-baby checkup?

variable.name: baby_feeding
variable.description: Did/does the baby suffer from feeding problems?

variable.name: baby_icu
variable.description: Was the baby put in an icu after he/she was born?

variable.name: baby_jaundice
variable.description: Did/does the baby suffer from jaundice?

variable.name: baby_problems_none
variable.description: The baby had/have no problems?

variable.name: baby_problems_notsure
variable.description: Not sure if the baby had/have problems?

variable.name: baby_respiratory
variable.description: Did/does the baby suffer from respiratory problems?

variable.name: baby_sick
variable.description: How many times has the baby gone for care when he/she was sick?

variable.name: baby_smoke_exposure
variable.description: About how many hours a day, on average, is the baby in the same room with someone who is smoking?

variable.name: beta_streptococcus_since_last_visit
variable.description: In the last two months (or since your last study visit), had Beta (Group B) Streptococcus?

variable.name: bv_since_last_visit
variable.description: In the last two months (or since your last study visit), had Bacterial Vaginosis?

variable.name: chemicals
variable.description: Exposure to any potentially dangerous chemicals (pesticides, etc.) since last study visit?

variable.name: chicken_pox_since_last_visit
variable.description: In the last two months (or since your last study visit), had Chicken Pox?

variable.name: diabetes
variable.description: Had diabetes since last study visit?

variable.name: doctor_yeast_meds_since_last_visit
variable.description: Doctor-prescribed yeast infection medication since last study visit?

variable.name: ear_sinus_since_last_visit
variable.description: In the last two months (or since your last study visit), had ear/sinus infection?

variable.name: fever_since_last_visit
variable.description: In the last two months (or since your last study visit), had fever?

variable.name: fifth_disease_since_last_visit
variable.description: In the last two months (or since your last study visit), had Fifth Disease?

variable.name: hospital_since_last_visit
variable.description: Hospitalized due to an accident or illness since last study visit?

variable.name: infection_antibiotic_since_last_visit
variable.description: Been diagnosed with an infection since last study visit? If yes, any antibiotic?

variable.name: listeriosis_since_last_visit
variable.description: In the last two months (or since your last study visit), had Listeriosis?

variable.name: new_medications
variable.description: Currently taking any new medications?

variable.name: otc_yeast_meds_since_last_visit
variable.description: Over-the counter yeast infection medication since last study visit?

variable.name: smoker_frequency
variable.description: Number of cigarettes in an average day since last study visit?

variable.name: smoker_no
variable.description: Do not smoke?

variable.name: smoker_second_hand
variable.description: Exposure to second hand smoke since last study visit?

variable.name: smoker_stopped_while_pregNAt
variable.description: Stopped smoking while pregnant?

variable.name: smoker_yes
variable.description: Smoke?

variable.name: still_breastfeeding
variable.description: Still breastfeeding?

variable.name: toxoplasmosis_since_last_visit
variable.description: Toxoplasmosis since last visit?

variable.name: uti_since_last_visit
variable.description: Uti since last visit?

variable.name: vaginitis_since_last_visit
variable.description: Vaginitis since last visit?

variable.name: vdischarge
variable.description: Currently have abnormal vaginal discharge?

variable.name: vitching
variable.description: Currently have vaginal itching?

variable.name: vodor
variable.description: Currently have a bad-smelling vaginal odor?

variable.name: yeast_infection_since_last_visit
variable.description: Yeast infection since last visit?
